Dexamethasone Premedication for Docetaxe.name: Dexamethasone (oral) Premedication
Dexamethasone Premedication for Docetaxe.description: Dexamethasone 8 mg PO BID on the day before, day of, and day after docetaxel to reduce the risk of hypersensitivity reactions and fluid retention
Dexamethasone Premedication for Docetaxe.notes: Administered on Days 0–2 relative to docetaxel (Day 1) to prevent fluid retention and hypersensitivity reactions. PO = by mouth; BID = twice daily.
